name: QuotesWizard
0:
”Alexa, ask Quotes Wizard for a quote”
”Alexa, ask Quotes Wizard to tell me a quote”
”Alexa, ask Quotes Wizard for the number of quotes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quotes wizard
des:
This skill tells you quotes from famous People. The database includes quotes from Albert Einstein, Aristotle, Mahatma Gandhi, Socrates and a lot more. The database the skill uses is open-source, it can be found at the following link: https://github.com/John000708/Quotes/blob/master/quotes.xml
Feel free to add quotes from famous people you know, as a bigger variety is needed!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
